text:
What's up everyone? Today we're learning English 
with this hilarious clip you've just watched from

Friends along with many others featuring cleaning 
obsessed Monica. But first let's see what Natalya

says about our lessons. She says that she can't 
imagine her days without our lessons anymore

because every week we make three lessons for you 
here to learn fast English, without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles. 
So make sure you join Natalia and our community

of over 4 million learners from all around 
the world by hitting that subscribe button

and the bell down below that way you will 
not miss a single one of our new lessons!

In our Fluent with Friends Course we'll 
teach you important pronunciation tips

just like this one of course along with thousands 
of the words we use in our everyday speech,

understanding how natives really speak, the 
correct grammar and laughing along with all

the jokes. So you can try that absolutely free 
right now with our three-part Masterclass!

just click up here or down in the 
description box below to sign up now.

If you want to learn more native vocabulary to 
take your English from intermediate to advanced

then I highly recommend you check out this lesson 
that Ethan made over on the RealLife English

YouTube channel. You can click up here or down 
in the description box below to watch that next!

Hey there before you watch the scenes without 
subtitles and test your knowledge with some quiz

questions I want to let you know that you 
can learn with us every single day across

our channels podcasts and on Instagram. That's 
right we publish lessons every day just for you

so I'll link all that information 
down in the description box below

so that you can check them out as soon 
as you finish watching this lesson.
